slide.title: Journalists need education
slide.subtitle: I am not blaming Zend here
slide.blurb: "One partner is Yahoo, which is helping Zend with version 6 of PHP..."
"... six months after Zend's last major product announcements, when it unveiled ... and PHP 5."
~Translated from German~: "Currently, the language [PHP] consists of Zend-Core which is developed exclusively by 20 Zend employees"
